headline: Zebra Technologies Jumps to Top Ten on Fast Company’s 2025 Best Workplaces for Innovators List
summary: LINCOLNSHIRE, Ill., September 25, 2025--Zebra Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ: ZBRA), a global leader in digitizing and automating workflows to deliver intelligent operations, today announced it is #8 on Fast Company’s 2025 list of the 100 Best Workplaces for Innovators, advancing from its #51 ranking last year. This recognition highlights Zebra’s dedication to fostering a collaborative environment where innovators can thrive and empower organizations globally with connected frontline, asset vi
